comments.author: Hhampuz
comments.body: Make sure to send in your wins before this ends! Only a few days left

comments.author: summonerrk
comments.body: Quote from: Hhampuz on November 24, 2023, 01:15:03 PMMake sure to send in your wins before this ends! Only a few days left Dear Manager, answer please: is no requirements for the amount of winnings? should it just be the fact of winning?

comments.author: Hhampuz
comments.body: Quote from: summonerrk on November 24, 2023, 01:54:30 PMQuote from: Hhampuz on November 24, 2023, 01:15:03 PMMake sure to send in your wins before this ends! Only a few days left Dear Manager, answer please: is no requirements for the amount of winnings? should it just be the fact of winning?Any multiplier, you can bet $0.2 and win $0.2 and that's a 1x hit that you can submit.

comments.author: xLays
comments.body: Sir Hhampuz, can we still submit entries or is it already over? It's been 7 days since it was posted. Thanks!

comments.author: Hhampuz
comments.body: Quote from: xLays on November 26, 2023, 07:28:38 PMSir Hhampuz, can we still submit entries or is it already over? It's been 7 days since it was posted. Thanks! Ends tomorrow, so there is still time to get your pick in or update your previous one

comments.author: Hhampuz
comments.body: Just about 2 ½ hours left until this one ends! Don't miss out on the chance to cash in on some nice free spins

comments.author: Hhampuz
comments.body: The results are in!Congratulations to our winners:1st with a 231x hit - Bitinity!2nd with a 64x hit - xLays! 3rd with a 25x hit - Betwrong!Thank you all for taking part in this. There's just a few things some of you need to improve on such as adding the multiplier in the PM you send me, and one user sent me a PM with the win but didn't post in this thread so they got disqualified, unfortunately. I hope to see you in the next one

comments.author: xLays
comments.created_time: November 27, 2023, 05:28:31 PMLast edit: November 27, 2023, 06:15:31 PM by xLays
comments.body: Quote from: Hhampuz on November 27, 2023, 05:12:23 PMThe results are in!Congratulations to our winners:1st with a 231x hit - Bitinity!2nd with a 64x hit - xLays! 3rd with a 25x hit - Betwrong!My bankroll for this contest was $150, and I ended up losing it all chasing a multiplier at least x100. Luckily, I won the 2nd prize so hopefully with the 300 free spins prize my bankroll will return. Thanks to Manager Hhampuz and FortuneJack for hosting this nice contest.

comments.author: summonerrk
comments.body: Quote from: Hhampuz on November 27, 2023, 05:12:23 PMThe results are in!Congratulations to our winners:1st with a 231x hit - Bitinity!2nd with a 64x hit - xLays! 3rd with a 25x hit - Betwrong!Thank you all for taking part in this. There's just a few things some of you need to improve on such as adding the multiplier in the PM you send me, and one user sent me a PM with the win but didn't post in this thread so they got disqualified, unfortunately. I hope to see you in the next one I congratulate the winners! I’m new to playing slots and didn’t quite understand the meaning of the competition, I thought it was like a lottery, but only then I realized that it was a multiplier competition.Quote231x hit - BitinityWow, that's a pretty serious multiplier! I hope that at that moment you bet at least 1 dollar per spin.Thank you to Hhampuz and Fortune Jack for this competition, we will wait for new ones, and I do not advise the winners to relax next time

comments.author: Bitinity
comments.body: Quote from: summonerrk on November 27, 2023, 08:29:53 PMQuote231x hit - BitinityWow, that's a pretty serious multiplier! I hope that at that moment you bet at least 1 dollar per spin.  Of course it was not a $1 bet, how could I do such a bet while my fund for the this contest was $50 only. I did not expect that I'd win the 1st place because I thought that 231x is just small number in multiplier contest. I'm not pretty sure why there are 4 participants only, slot multiplier contest in this forum is used to be the best non-free contest with the most participants but this less number of participant is obviously a benefit because we have bigger chance to win

comments.author: Betwrong
comments.body: Quote from: Hhampuz on November 27, 2023, 05:12:23 PMThe results are in!Congratulations to our winners:1st with a 231x hit - Bitinity!2nd with a 64x hit - xLays! 3rd with a 25x hit - Betwrong!Thank you all for taking part in this. There's just a few things some of you need to improve on such as adding the multiplier in the PM you send me, and one user sent me a PM with the win but didn't post in this thread so they got disqualified, unfortunately. I hope to see you in the next one With just 25x I surely wasn't expecting to win anything. Well, my expectations were on the low side, let's put it like this.  A pleasant surprise.Thank you, Hhampuz and FortuneJack!
